Producer: Andy Lau, Johnnie To, Ka-Fai Wai
Synopsis: Hong Kong superstar Andy Lau re-teams with directors Johnnie To ("The Mission") and Wa Ka Fai for a spectacular no holds barred cinematic extravaganza. Lau plays Tok, a flamboyant new assassin who sets out to become the number one killer by taking down O (Takashi Sorimachi), a disciplined and isolated killer. Unexpectedly they become involved with the same woman.
Title: Fulltime Killer
